tasks.label: Build SFML 2.6.0
args: if (!(Test-Path output)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path output | Out-Null }; g++ C:/game2/Platformer/src/*.cpp -I"C:/game2/Platformer/include" -I"C:/game2/SFML-2.6.0/include" -L"C:/game2/SFML-2.6.0/lib" -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -mconsole -o output/main.exe; if ($?) { Copy-Item "C:/game2/SFML-2.6.0/bin/*.dll" output/ -Force; Copy-Item "C:/game2/Platformer/assets" output/ -Recurse -Force; Start-Process -NoNewWindow ./output/main.exe -WorkingDirectory ./output }
